## Summary

Describe the purpose of this PR and what it changes.

## Changes

- Mobile contact bar: lifted from bottom and added safe-area padding
- Desktop-only floating WhatsApp/Call buttons
- Play button raised on mobile to sit above contact bar
- Cursor UX: fine-pointer detection, reduced motion respect, global CSS styles
- FAQs expanded (Website, Branding, Logo, Packaging)
